title: Arcanum Ultima: One Year Anniversay
description:
So yeah, its been one year since I released it...so heres the new readme:



		  Arcanum: Of Steamworks & Magick Obscura
				Ulitma Edition 
		  ---------------------------------------


Contents:
---------
1. About Ultima Edition
2. How to START Arcanum
3. The Bonus Material
4. The Dedication
5. Want more?




1. About Ultima Edition
---------------

2008
Ultima Edition of Arcanum was created in the spring break of 2008 when my Girlfriend wanted a copy of Arcanum. This edition has the No-CD Crack installed and has Extra material that you may want such as extra Modules and The Character Editor. Also Included in this edition is a small guide the Manual for the game and Module Editor. There was a few idiotic moments when making this....One was the Bordum the other was the fact that I wasn't going to make it public...But Hey what can I say, I download alot so I decided to give in return. 

2009
A year later and Drog has been working up a storm, so in this edition alot of his features have been added for your pleasure. A lot of the portraits have been remove because the fact that they need to be organized, but if you still have last years edition you can still recover all those portraits. Also note this editon your old save games wont work, and any updates you install from drog will break them to.



2. How to START ARCANUM
-----------------------

Arcanium Ultima2 is now a setup only game, and after install please use the Icon on the Desktop or the Icon on the Start menu for the fact is the New Arcanum has a bigger resoltution, and can be changed with the Menu.


3. The Bonus Material
-----------------------
	*Offical Trokia Modules
	*Max level 126 
	*Map
	*HQ Music intergrated
	*Character Editor
	*Custom DVD Cover Image 
	*Manual to Game
	*Manual to World Editor
	*Patched with Drogs current release 081229
	*High Res Town Pack
	*The Lost Module now included with install
	*The offical OST 
	*Removed alot of the Portraits and added a fwe

4. The Dedication
------------------------
Note: A lot of problems where easily fixed using these instructions after the install

Delete the Arcanum.cfg
And make sure under Vista or Windows 7 please give the setup and the game Admin rights



5. Want more?
-------------------------

Offically I may be done with Arcanum Ultima, unless Drog continues all his updates, then you may expect a new one,  Especially if he keeps adding more content then yes of course.

And I want to say personally thank you Drog, for all your efforts and work, if it wasn't for that, this game would probably fade into the dust.
